com.layar.sdk.location

Class FixedLocationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.layar.sdk.location.BaseLocationProvider
      • com.layar.sdk.location.FixedLocationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocationProvider

    public class FixedLocationProvider
extends BaseLocationProvider
    Simple location provider for testing purposes. It always returns the fixed location to all listeners. Useful for testing geo content from a different location.

    • Method Detail

      • setFixedLocation

        public void setFixedLocation(Location fixedLocation)
        Set the fixed location to report to use. If any LocationListeners are registered they will be notified about the new location.
        Parameters:
        fixedLocation -

      • getCurrentLocation

        public Location getCurrentLocation()
        Description copied from interface: LocationProvider
        Request the current (or last) known location.
        Returns:
        Last known location or null if we don't know the location yet.
